articles.title: Australian veteran Simon Clarke wins Tour de France fifth stage in crowning achievement in 20-year career - ABC News
articles.description: Australian cycling veteran Simon Clarke earns a magnificent, last-ditch Tour de France triumph to crown 20 years of slog on Europe's roads after a brutal, crash-strewn cobbled stage.
articles.content:
Australian cycling veteran Simon Clarke has earned a magnificent, last-ditch Tour de France triumph to crown 20 years of slog on Europe's roads after a brutal, crash-strewn cobbled stage.

articles.author: Cat Clifford
articles.title: Europe will count natural gas and nuclear as green energy in some circumstances - CNBC
articles.description: The European Union voted on Wednesday to keep natural gas and nuclear in its green energy taxonomy under certain, limited circumstances.
articles.content:
The European Union voted on Wednesday to keep some specific uses of natural gas and nuclear energy in its taxonomy of sustainable sources of energy.

articles.author: Agencies
articles.title: Brent crude falls below $100 for first time since late April - Economic Times
articles.description: Europe's benchmark crude contract, Brent North Sea, dropped 3.3 percent to $99.39 per barrel in mid-afternoon deals, while US counterpart WTI oil also fell 3.3 percent to stand at $96.12.
articles.content: London-World oil prices spiralled lower Wednesday on fears that a potential recession will slash demand, with Brent crude sinking under $100 per barrel for the first time since April 25th as recessio… [+771 chars]
